comment: Emily Martinez: My experience with BitMax has been excellent. Their platform is user-friendly and their fees are competitive.
Daniel White: BitMax offers a great trading experience with low spreads and fast execution. Very satisfied!
Michael Brown: BitMax needs to improve their withdrawal process and platform stability. Not recommended.
